issue.title: [Developer][Integration] Makefile.docker's target names are broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8046](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8046). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
docker-compose.yml now prefixes targets with platform identifiers: `cpp -> conda-cpp`

Makefile.docker does not include these prefixes, and should be updated or removed

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8046?focusedCommentId=17097268) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
The docker makefile is pretty outdated and going to be removed in favor of a python implementation.
